verses.name: Matthew 26:11
verses.text: For ye have the poor always with you; but me ye have not always.

verses.name: Matthew 26:12
verses.text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body, she did it for my burial.

verses.name: Matthew 26:13
verses.text: Verily I say unto you, Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world, there shall also this, that this woman hath done, be told for a memorial of her.

verses.name: Matthew 26:14
verses.text: Then one of the twelve, called Judas Iscariot, went unto the chief priests,
